Package servlets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AppConstants
    This class holds all the string constants used to access, view and manipulate the SQL database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatmeServlet
    This is the main ChatmeServlet.
    CreateChannelServlet
    The CreateChannelServlet is used to create a new channel via http post.
    GetMessagesServlet
    The GetMessagesServlet is used to get all messages that belong to a given channel.
    GetUserPrivateChannelsServlet
    This servlet is used to get all private channels belonging to a given username
    GetUserPublicChannelsServlet
    This servlet is used to get all public channels belonging to a given username
    LogInServlet
    This servlet is used to check the login details of a client.
    ManageUserDBFromJsonFile
    A listener that reads the database from the computer and populates the data into a Derby database.
    SearchPublicChannelServlet
    This servlet is used to search public channels by name.
    SendMessageServlet
    Servlet for sending message request
    ShowPublicChannelsServlet
    This Servlet is in charge on displaying all the public channel of the user
    SignUpServlet
    This Servlet handles the ligin requests
    SubscribeServlet
    Servlet for Subscribe requests
    UnsubscribeServlet
    Servlet for Subscribe requests
    UpdateEntryTimeServlet
    This servlet is in charge on updating the entry time of specific user to specific channel
    UpdateExitTimeServlet
    This servlet is in charge on updating the exit time of specific user to specific channel
